question: Where is the enzyme PM20D1 localized?
ideal_answer: PM20D1 is enriched in UCP1+ adipocytes

snippets.text: we identify a secreted enzyme, peptidase M20 domain containing 1 (PM20D1), that is enriched in UCP1(+) versus UCP1(-) adipocytes
A secreted enzyme, PM20D1, enriched in UCP1+ adipocytes, exhibits catalytic and hydrolytic activity to reversibly form N-acyl amino acids.
